H0.text: What name is given to the science or study of poisons. Pharmacology

H1.text: What name is given to the science or study of poisons. Venology

H2.text: What name is given to the science or study of poisons. Toxinology

H3.text: What name is given to the science or study of poisons. Toxicology

A4.text: Toxicology is a scientific discipline, overlapping with biology, chemistry, pharmacology, and medicine, that involves the study of the adverse effects of chemical substances on living organisms and the practice of diagnosing and treating exposures to toxins and toxicants.
